title: [Health] Spain's large-scale study on the coronavirus indicates just 5% of its population has developed antibodies, strengthening evidence that a so-called herd immunity to Covid-19 is "unachievable,". Findings come from a nationwide representative sample of more than 61,000 participants

[Neuroscience] Children with COVID-19 may present with new neurological symptoms and brain changes on imaging, in the absence of respiratory symptoms, finds a new study in JAMA Neurology (1 July 2020)
